data.title: Amazon Operations
data.meta_description: Amazon Operations is at the heart of Amazon’s mission to be Earth’s mos customer-centric company. It’s more than packing and delivering boxes; it’s making an impact for customers around the world. We lead around-the-clock efforts to ensure we keep our ...
data.text:
Amazon Operations is at the heart of Amazon’s mission to be Earth’s most customer-centric company. It’s more than packing and delivering boxes; it’s making an impact for customers around the world. We lead around-the-clock efforts to ensure we keep our delivery promise.

Our wide range of roles may surprise you, from engineers building the latest technology in robotics and AI, to managers leading the teams responsible for fulfilling billions of packages, associates delivering on behalf of customers, safety specialists ensuring best-in-class workplace health and safety, and technicians who keep our facilities and equipment humming.

Build the career you want with career development pathways and access to benefits your first day, while making an impact at a scale only possible with Amazon. Whether finishing your degree, continuing in your field, or looking to start a new career, you’ll find opportunities at Amazon Operations.
